edu.berkeley.atdp.java.game.pong.logic
Class PaddleLogic

java.lang.Object
  edu.berkeley.atdp.java.game.logic.PlayerLogic
      edu.berkeley.atdp.java.game.pong.logic.PaddleLogic
Direct Known Subclasses:
Keyboard, Wobbly
public abstract class PaddleLogic
extends PlayerLogic

Extends the PlayerLogic class in order to provide a framework with which developers may create logical instructions for their pong paddles.

Author:
Jonathan Berney

Field Summary
protected  int enemyIndex
          A reference index for the enemy playable character.
protected  double target
          Represents where the paddle would like to get to as soon as possible.

Constructor Detail

PaddleLogic

public PaddleLogic(int playerIndex)
Creats a new paddle logic class with the index given by the playerIndex input. Initializes the enemy index based on the playerIndex argument.

Parameters:
playerIndex - The player's index.
